job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of developing predictive models for a specific business problem (ad suitability).

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of building predictive models for conversion and click-through rates, a classic ML task.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: Another clear example of developing predictive models based on user content consumption.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This refers to data processing and integration within a big data environment, fitting the data engineering aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and maintenance of data pipelines and monitoring systems, which falls under data engineering and operations.

job_tasks.phrase: You build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, â€¦)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions DevOps practices like infra-as-code and CI/CD, which are core to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This covers the entire ML model lifecycle from analysis and experimentation to implementation and presentation of results.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines (python, PySpark, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Airflow,..)
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions building data stacks and pipelines using specific tools.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the task of building out an ML Ops platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of services with other teams, a core software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Indien gewenst, bouw je mee aan onze web-applicaties (voor interne & externe gebruikers) die onze data-producten ontsluiten
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in building web applications to expose data products, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
job_tasks.justification: Participation in Scrum ceremonies is a standard software development team practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Je analyseert requirements
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing requirements is a key part of understanding business needs and translating them into technical tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to business teams signifies understanding and communicating business value.

job_tasks.phrase: Je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers.
job_tasks.justification: Working within a Scrum team with a Product Owner implies understanding business requirements and priorities.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
job_tasks.justification: Participation in Scrum ceremonies is a form of team collaboration and communication.

job_tasks.phrase: presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to both technical and business teams requires strong communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Je coach je Machine Learning engineers
job_tasks.justification: Coaching junior engineers is a clear indicator of communication and collaboration skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership and accountability is a direct indicator of innovation and ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: rolt best practises uit
job_tasks.justification: Rolling out best practices is an operational task related to standardizing processes and improving efficiency.

Rolling out best practices is an operational task related to standardizing processes and improving efficiency.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for advertising, conversion, and user profiling. While it mentions data pipelines, MLOps, and integration, there is no mention of Generative AI specific tasks like LLMs, RAG, or prompt engineering. The tasks are predominantly in Macro-Category B (Model Development & Fine-Tuning, Data Engineering & Management) with supporting tasks in Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration, Operations & MLOps). This aligns with the 'Core ML Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the types of models and tasks involved, explicitly mentioning predictive modeling and data pipelines. There is no ambiguity regarding the use of Generative AI, which is absent from the description. This clarity allows for a high-confidence classification.
